withdraw.title: Withdrawal your funds
withdraw.text: The minimum amount to withdraw is $20.
withdraw.text2: Withdrawals are made within 24 business hours and can take up to 48 business hours.
withdraw.text3: Money cannot be withdrawn to accounts that do not belong to the account holder.
withdraw.higher20: The amount must be greater than 20 dollars
